remarks: Ordering of a meet and join with a common variable.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2012.)
statement:
latledi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latledi.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latledi.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
latledi.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latmlej22 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( Y ./\ X ) .<_ ( Z .\/ X ) ) $.
